Race.SpecificTitle: School District No. 1 -- 24.15 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
School District No. 1 Proposition
(Property Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of Ouachita Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a special tax of twenty-four and fifteen hundredths (24.15) mills on all of the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $18,963,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the support, maintenance and operation of the public school facilities in said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: School Sales Tax District No. 1 -- 1/2% S&U Tax Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
School Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition 
(1/2% Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall School Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of Ouachita, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one per cent (1/2%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $8,356,644 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years from and after the termination of its current authorization on December 31, 2022, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on sales of services in said District, all as defined by law, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purpose of providing additional support for the public school system of the Ouachita Parish School Board?
